title:
Is there anything we can do to keep the few manic train engineers from honking their horns every few seconds as they slowly cruises through Wilmington in the wee hours? 



There must be thousands of people that hear this every night. 



We don\'t go around honking the horn every few seconds to warn people we\'re coming in our cars, so I\'m curious why some engineers feel they need to do this.
text:
This previous post at MyReporter.com should answer your question:



http://www.myreporter.com/?p=9830
